thread.title: Crashes close A55 in north
thread.title_full: Crashes close A55 in north Wales - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Crashes close A55 in north
text:
One man has been left with life changing injuries following two serious crashes which happened on the A55 on Anglesey this morning.
Both are believed to have occurred only moments apart on the same stretch of the A55 at Bodedern between J4 Llanfihangel and J3 Valley.
The first crash involved a grey Ford Focus and red Honda motorcycle, followed by another involving a black VW Polo and black Nissan Pathfinder.
The motorcyclist was air lifted to hospital with 'serious injuries'.
We are advising motorists to seek alternate routes where possible or allow extra time for your journey if unavoidable but to check first with Traffic Wales or local radio for further updates
â€“ Sergeant Tony Gatley, Roads Policing Unit North Wales Police are now appealing for witnesses following a full investigation which is now underway.
They are working to fully re-open the A55 as soon as possible but motorists may experience some delays.
Wales North Wales
